headline: 4 Non-Ferrous Metal Mining Stocks to Watch in a Promising Industry
summary: The outlook of the Zacks Mining - Non Ferrous industry is promising, backed by strong demand. Stocks like FCX, CDE, LEU and ERO are poised to benefit from this.
